location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Shiraz to Charles Alison

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the possibility of moving the residency to Arab soil in order to escape the machinations of Persia and explaning procedures for the copying of letters and circulation of relevant information to the british agents in the Gulf and regarding instructions for all telegrams to be sent in Cipher.
